name: hwptoolkit-example-nextjs-app-router-fetch-data
description: A headless WordPress application using Next.js App Router and the fetch API to fetch data from WordPress using WPGraphQL.

scripts.example:build: pnpm run wp:images:unzip && pnpm run wp:start && pnpm run wp:db:import && pnpm run example:dev
scripts.example:start: pnpm run wp:start && pnpm run example:dev
scripts.wp:db:query: wp-env run cli -- wp db query
scripts.wp:db:export: wp-env run cli -- wp db export /var/www/html/db/database.sql
scripts.wp:db:import: wp-env run cli -- wp db import /var/www/html/db/database.sql

author: hwptoolkit
